__e: "Leonard is suspected of murdering the old lady I told you about."
The key to your part, Leonard, is you're in love, got it?
Leonard's more a part of my world.
We're married, and don't let me catch you forgetting it.
Uh, well, considering that Leonard won't talk, you probably know more than we do.
For one thing, Leonard's in there all the time.
Leonard is free and we did it.
Uh... [Clears Throat] Bo. Reason I called is Leonard is down here.
EVEN THOUGH LEONARD'S ALWAYS ASKING YOU TO GO OUT WITH HIM. AND I JUST--
